    var map = L.map('map', {
        fullscreenControl: {
            pseudoFullscreen: true, 
        }
    });
    map.toggleFullscreen();
    map.setView([20, 0], 2);
    mapLink = 
        '<a href="https://openstreetmap.org">OpenStreetMap</a>';
    L.tileLayer(
        'https://{s}.tile.openstreetmap.org/{z}/{x}/{y}.png', {
        attribution: '&copy; ' + mapLink + ' Contributors',
        maxZoom: 12,
        }).addTo(map);
    
    fixlink = 'Fix this link or add a new live cam <a href="https://github.com/emijrp/emijrp.github.io/edit/master/viajes/live-cams.wiki">here</a>.';
    
    for (var i = 0; i < places.length; i++) {
        marker = new L.marker([places[i][3], places[i][4]])
            .bindPopup('<b>' + places[i][0] + ', ' + places[i][1] + ', ' + places[i][2] + '</b><br/><br/><iframe width="300" height="200" src="https://www.youtube-nocookie.com/embed/' + places[i][5] + '?autoplay=1&rel=0" frameborder="0" allow="autoplay; encrypted-media" allowfullscreen></iframe><br/><br/>' + fixlink, { autoClose:false, closeOnClick:false, closePopupOnClick: false } )
            .addTo(map);
    }
    
    var t = L.terminator();
    t.addTo(map);
    setInterval(function(){updateTerminator(t)}, 10000);
    function updateTerminator(t) {
      var t2 = L.terminator();
      t.setLatLngs(t2.getLatLngs());
      t.redraw();
    }
